response.answer_text: Unfortunately YES!! Now, I don't tap on Explore button as frequent I used to do before. After the ban of TIKTOK in India. Instagram took responsibility to give some people job! 🙂 Now, unfortunately its the new version of TikTok! INSTAGRAM REELS!  Image source - Google And the worst part is that, Tiktokers are posting their tiktok videos there which they have previously uploaded on tiktok before. And…The… worst to worst part is that… Instagram is not going to ban! 🙂 (until they don't break government laws) So now, we have to face them on Instagram too! We can hope that people don't appreciate here those CRINGE CONTENT at least!  Thanks for reading! Until next time, see ya, have a good day! We’ll meet soon! ❤️ ~Karan :)
Ha Ha Ha. You are seeing more TikTok videos on Instagram write? But Instagram never becomes a TikTok again. Because everyone has seen how TikTok rise and its fall.
